title: Amazon | SDE II | Hyderabad
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3.6
Prior Experience: Backend Developer at mid-sized US company

Current Compensation:
Base Salary: ₹32.4 LPA
Bonus: 10% perf bonus + 2L LTI bonus yearly
Total CTC: ~₹37.5 LPA


Date of the Offer: Feburay 2025
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Hyderabad


Offer Compensation
Salary: ₹44 LPA
First year signing bonus: ₹17 LPA
Second year signing bonus: ₹13 LPA
Stock Bonus:  200 unit (₹40,23,382 LPA)
Relocation Bonus: 1.5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 44 + 17 + 2L ~ 63 LPA for 1st year
Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits -> Wifi, Medical Insurance, Cab, Food etc
Other details: 5 days WFO


Negotiation Details:
Increased base from 43 to 44L. Dont have any competing offer yet.

Please evaluate this offer.

title: UBER | SDE II | India
content:
Education: M.Tech in CSE 
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: SDE-2 at FAANG
Prev Comp: 58 LPA
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: Uber
Title/Level: SDE II
Location: India
Salary: 49 LPA
Stock bonus: $50,000 for 4 years
Bonus: 7 LPA Fixed (Can vary to 14 LPA based on performance)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 49 + 7 + ~11 = 67 LPA 
Benefits: Uber ride benefits + welness reimbursement
Other details: Offer accepted.

title: Flipkart | SDE-III | Offer
content:
Education: Tier-2
Years of Experience: 5
Prior Experience: SDE at a Bank
Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
Company: Flipkart
Title/Level: SDE-III
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 43 LPA
Stock bonus: 28 LPA vested over 4 years
Bonus: 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 43 + 6.45 + 7 = 56 LPA

Current Base 32 LPA + 15% bonus
